column5: So I was talking to a friend and he was telling me he used to ice fish out of Shades mill in Cambridge? Has anyone been at all lately? Id like some more info if anyone has it..Even a PM will do. Thanks in advance guys n Gals
I don't think that they open for ice-fishing until after the 1st of January. There are perch, crappie, bluegill, sunfish, rockbass and some pike that may take a bait during the ice season in Shade's.
